title: WTT: D304 card for a T206 HOF
author: eiturbe

posts.post_title: WTT: D304 card for a T206 HOF
posts.post_content:
I like my D304 cards very much, but lately I have been hit by the T206 bug hard... :) So I was wondering if anyone would like to trade a t206 for a d304 card I have... it is a SGC graded (SGC 20) Merkle card, and I would like to trade it for a T206 HOF (SGC graded), I would rather be it a portrait and even better if it is a Sovereign back, I do not have any

PM if you are interested, I can provide some pics,

thanks!

Eduardo
